home.welcome: Welcome to the Medical AI Training Platform!
home.demoDescription: A powerful medical AI training platform built on Calimero's P2P network. Securely train, deploy, and share medical AI models with privacy-preserving technology.
home.calimeroIntro: Calimero is a privacy-focused blockchain network that enables developers to build scalable, private applications. Our platform provides the infrastructure for creating decentralized applications with enhanced privacy and performance.

description.title: Welcome to the Medical AI Training Platform
description.subtitle: A privacy-preserving medical AI training platform
features: Upload and train medical AI models on the Calimero P2P network
Secure medical scan storage with HIPAA compliance
Peer-to-peer medical data sharing with full ownership
description.getStarted: Connect your wallet to get started
